books.title: The Last Unicorn
books.author: Peter S. Beagle
books.description: The Last Unicorn is a fantasy novel by American author Peter S. Beagle and published in 1968, by Viking Press in the U.S. and The Bodley Head in the U.K. It follows the tale of a unicorn, who believes she is the last of her kind in the world and undertakes a quest to discover what has happened to the other unicorns.

books.title: Ender's Game
books.author: Orson Scott Card
books.description: Ender's Game is a 1985 military science fiction novel by American author Orson Scott Card. Set at an unspecified date in Earth's future, the novel presents an imperiled humankind after two conflicts with an insectoid alien species they dub 'the buggers'

books.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: the first of three volumes of the epic novel[1] The Lord of the Rings by the English author J. R. R. Tolkien; it is followed by The Two Towers and The Return of the King. The action takes place in the fictional universe of Middle-earth.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.description: The Hunger Games follows 16-year-old Katniss Everdeen, a girl from District 12 who volunteers for the 74th Hunger Games in place of her younger sister Primrose Everdeen.

books.title: Twilight
books.author: Stephenie Meyer
books.description: Twilight introduces seventeen-year-old Isabella 'Bella' Swan, who moves from Phoenix, Arizona, to Forks, Washington. She is endangered after falling in love with Edward Cullen, a 103-year-old vampire frozen in his 17-year-old body.
